meanings.definition: A person or entity that transfers something to another.
meanings.sent1: The transferors handed over the keys to the new owner.
meanings.sent2: The transferors signed the deed to pass the property to the buyer.
meanings.sent3: The transferors jokingly pretended to give away their imaginary kingdom.
meanings.sent4: The transferors were like magical wizards, bestowing gifts upon the recipients.
meanings.sent5: The transferors were like Santa Claus, spreading joy and gifts to everyone.

meanings.definition: The party transferring ownership or rights to another party.
meanings.sent1: In the contract, the transferors agreed to transfer all rights to the new company.
meanings.sent2: The transferors completed the paperwork to officially transfer ownership of the business.
meanings.sent3: The transferors playfully passed the imaginary crown to the new ruler.
meanings.sent4: The transferors were like conductors, orchestrating the smooth transition of ownership.
meanings.sent5: The transferors were like relay racers, passing the baton of ownership to the next runner.
